gurmukhi: auTy bIr jyqy iqqy kwl kUty ]
transliteration: Outhe Boor Jete Tite Kaal Koote||
translation: All the warriors who arose, were destroyed by Kali.

gurmukhi: pry crm brmM khUM gwq tUty ]
transliteration: Dare Charam Baramannd Kahoon Gadt Toote||
translation: Somewhere their shields, armour and wounded bodies are lying scattered;

gurmukhi: ijqI BUm m`DM prI sROx DwrM ]
transliteration: Jitoo Bhoom Maddhan Daroo Sraoun Dhaaran||
translation: With all the drops of blood that fall on the ground.

gurmukhi: jgy sUr qyqy kIey mwr mwrM ]11]88]
transliteration: Jage Soor Tete Kooe Maar Maaran||11||88||
translation: The same number of warriors arise shouting “kill, kill”. 11.88.

gurmukhi: prI ku`t ku`tM ruly q`C mu`CM ]
transliteration: Daroo Koutt Kouttan Rule Tachchh Mouchchhan||
translation: There were struck blows after blows and the warriors being chopped are rolling in dust.

gurmukhi: khUM muMf quMfM khUM mws mu`CM ]
transliteration: Kahoon Mounnd Toundan Kahoon Maas Mouchchhan||
translation: Their heads, faces and pieces of flesh are lying scattered.

gurmukhi: BXo cwr sY kos lau bIr KyqM ]
transliteration: Bhayo Chaar Sai Kos Lau Boor Khetan||
translation: For four hundred kos, the battlefield was occupied by warriors.
Most of whom are lying dead or senseless.12.89.

gurmukhi: chUM Er FUky ] muKM mwr kUky ]
JMfw g`f gwFy ] mcy ros bwFy ]13]90]
transliteration: Jhandaa Gadd Gaddhe|| Mache Ros Baadhe||13||90||
translation: They have fixed firmly their banners and in excitement their rage is increasing.13.90.

gurmukhi: Bry bIr hrKM ] krI bwx brKM ]
transliteration: Bhare Boor Harkhan|| Daroo Baan Barkhan||
translation: The warriors filled with delight are showering their arrows.

gurmukhi: cvM cwr Fu`ky ] pCy Awhu ru`ky ]14]91]
transliteration: Chavan Chaar Dhoukke|| Pachhe Aah(u) Roukke||14||91||
translation: All the four types of forces are moving forward and staying in their arens.14.91.

gurmukhi: prI ssqR JwrM ] clI sRox DwrM ]
transliteration: Daroo Sastra Jhaaran|| Chaloo Sron Dhaaran||
translation: With the use of all the weapons, the stream of blood began to flow.
